Filter (autotransform.filter.base)

The base class and associated classes for Filter components.

class autotransform.filter.base.Filter(params: autotransform.filter.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.filter.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Filter components. Used by AutoTransform to determine if an Item from an Input is eligible for transformation.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Filter. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

_inverted

Whether to invert the results of the Filter.

Type

bool

bundle() → autotransform.filter.base.FilterBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

FilterBundle

classmethod from_data(inverted: Optional[bool], data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.filter.base.Filter

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid. Handles the inversion capabilities of the Filter.

Parameters

  • data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

  • inverted (Optional[bool]) – Whether the Filter was inverted before encoding.

Returns

An instance of the Filter.

Return type

Filter

get_params() → autotransform.filter.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Filter.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Filter.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.filter.type.FilterType

Used to map Filter components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Filter.

Return type

FilterType

invert() → autotransform.filter.base.Filter

Inverts the results that the Filter will provide. Inverting an already inverted Filter will return it to normal operation.

Returns

The Filter after setting the inversion.

Return type

Filter

is_valid(item: autotransform.item.base.Item) → bool

Check whether an Item is valid based on the Filter and handle inversion.

Parameters

item (Item) – The Item to check.

Returns

Returns True if the Item is eligible for transformation

Return type

bool

class autotransform.filter.base.FilterBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Filter object used for JSON encoding.

inverted: Optional[bool]
params: Mapping[str, Any]
type: autotransform.filter.type.FilterType
